Bro fr sold his mom

Now as for this this hentai, it clearly is an Ntr. The cuck trusted his mother and expected her to turn down kengo. He knew kengo didn't have a chance as she was strict againts relationships and whatnot. However, by the end, his mother said something along the lines "I once loved studious boys like you, but now im in love with naughty boys like him" and "I love kengo more than my son", implying that her body and mind had been stolen away. His once proud mom has turned into a whore. I rest my case.

@Never.Forever Im very late but i cant stand not correcting ur confident words. THIS is NTR. Ntr is different from cheating/cuckold. Ntr is anything that envokes a feeling of loss (someone getting stolen from you). It doesn't have to be a gf or a wife. It could be ur mom getting stolen by ur friend, ur once proud sister getting broken by ur bully, or even possibly ur dog getting fucked by the neighbour's alpha. Try looking up the ntr tag and you'll see tons of ntr that don't even involve a romantic relationship.
